chapters.title: Chapter 22: The Price of the Ring
chapters.info: Gyldan, p. 261 (207)—Aes Sedai of the Red Ajah who appears in Egwene's viewings inside the testing ter'angreal. She was Elaida's closest confidante and clearly also a Darkfriend (in the world of the ter'angreal, at least). She tried to stop Egwene from escaping from the Tower; Egwene folded her with a punch between the eyes, a move she was very glad Perrin taught her.
